name: part_002
file: tmp_【 #アキロゼ生誕祭2024 】ーFantasia of Bremenー￤3DLIVE【ホロライブ⧸アキ・ローゼンタール】 [pFZiKpoxuvw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Musical performance in a tavern setting with Nekomata Okayu, Inugami Korone, and Aki Rosenthal.
Curtain closes as the audience applauds, transitioning to a new scene.
Aki Rosenthal performs her song 'MYSTERIOUS' on a dark stage with star-like lighting.

subtitles.original: さあ寄ってらっしゃい見てらっしゃい
subtitles.english: Step right up, take a look

subtitles.original: これより語るはいさましき勇者の
subtitles.english: I shall now tell you a tale of a brave hero's

subtitles.original: 奇々怪々な冒険譚
subtitles.english: Bizarre and mysterious adventure

subtitles.original: 旅立ちの朝　黒煙を
subtitles.english: On the morning of departure, coughing out black smoke

subtitles.original: 吐きかける　おんぼろ馬車
subtitles.english: Is a rickety old carriage

subtitles.original: 古の賢人に　玉座を
subtitles.english: To the sages of old, let's hand over

subtitles.original: 空け渡そう
subtitles.english: The throne

subtitles.original: なんか凄そう！
subtitles.english: Sounds pretty impressive!

subtitles.original: ってどういう意味？
subtitles.english: But what does that mean?

subtitles.original: 朝にムカついて　お年寄りに
subtitles.english: He got annoyed in the morning and

subtitles.original: 席を譲ったってこと？
subtitles.english: Gave up his seat to an elderly person?

subtitles.original: さあいさましき勇者に
subtitles.english: Now, for the brave hero...

subtitles.original: 賞賛をー
subtitles.english: ...praise be!

subtitles.original: でも決まって　ほら吹き回り
subtitles.english: But as always, the tall tales spread

subtitles.original: 現実超えた　空想こそが
subtitles.english: Fantasy that transcends reality is...

subtitles.original: 美しいのに
subtitles.english: ...what's truly beautiful

subtitles.original: つまりそれって
subtitles.english: In other words,

subtitles.original: 共に奏でよう
subtitles.english: Let's play together

subtitles.original: まだ見ぬ空想のメロディを
subtitles.english: A melody of fantasy yet unseen

subtitles.original: 遥か異国の地
subtitles.english: In a far-off foreign land

subtitles.original: 開かれる宴
subtitles.english: A feast is held

subtitles.original: 不可思議というのか　面白い
subtitles.english: Call it mysterious or call it fun

subtitles.original: 新たな冒険か
subtitles.english: A new adventure

subtitles.original: よろしわが力を
subtitles.english: Very well, I shall...

subtitles.original: 捧げよう
subtitles.english: ...offer my strength

subtitles.original: ブレーメンへ行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go to Bremen

subtitles.original: 空想がもっと輝ける
subtitles.english: Where fantasy can shine even brighter

subtitles.original: それが音楽だから行こう
subtitles.english: Because that is music, let's go

subtitles.original: 一緒に
subtitles.english: Together

subtitles.original: 一番美味しい役をやりましょう
subtitles.english: Let's take on the best role

subtitles.original: 誰よりも悲しくて　あどけない役を
subtitles.english: A role sadder and more innocent than anyone else

subtitles.original: 四角い海の果てでも　変わるがわる
subtitles.english: Even at the edge of the square sea, ever-changing

subtitles.original: 人模様　演じていることそれさえも
subtitles.english: Human drama, even the fact that we're performing

subtitles.original: 忘れる世界
subtitles.english: Is forgotten in this world

subtitles.original: みんな籠の中の問い
subtitles.english: Everyone is a question inside a cage

subtitles.original: いつか抜け出す日　夢見ん
subtitles.english: Dreaming of the day we'll eventually break free

subtitles.original: やっと手にしたその時　大空へと
subtitles.english: And when we finally grasp it, toward the great sky...

subtitles.original: 戸惑う
subtitles.english: ...we hesitate

subtitles.original: MYSTERIOUS
subtitles.english: MYSTERIOUS

subtitles.original: 名前をあげて　安心させましょう
subtitles.english: Let's give it a name and set it at ease

subtitles.original: 加護はかからない　あなたの
subtitles.english: No protection will reach your...

subtitles.original: MYSTERIOUS
subtitles.english: MYSTERIOUS

subtitles.original: 星座を渡り紡ぎ　空へと逃げ仰せても
subtitles.english: Even weaving through constellations to escape to the sky

subtitles.original: 体には熱たしさ　あどけないね　ねえ
subtitles.english: The heat remains in your body, how innocent, right?

subtitles.original: 時計のない国で　誰もいらない
subtitles.english: In a land without clocks, where no one is needed

subtitles.original: この街で　淡い雪を降らす
subtitles.english: In this town, making faint snow fall

subtitles.original: 青い太陽
subtitles.english: Is the blue sun

subtitles.original: 窓もドアも風もなく　思い描く
subtitles.english: With no windows, doors, or wind, imagining

subtitles.original: 不死の鳥　間違いも答えもない
subtitles.english: An immortal bird, with no right or wrong answers

subtitles.original: 自由へと彷徨う
subtitles.english: Wandering toward freedom

subtitles.original: MYSTERIOUS
subtitles.english: MYSTERIOUS

subtitles.original: ひしめく果てを　弾ませ　守るのは
subtitles.english: Making the crowded end bounce, what we protect is

subtitles.original: 横しまな清らかさ　抱きしめられては
subtitles.english: A wicked purity, and once embraced...

subtitles.original: 飛び立つ
subtitles.english: ...it takes flight
